1.text: Hiya %player%.  Your trip planning going well?

next.text: Thank you so much, Hien.  Once I'm abroad, I'll start paying you back.

10.text: It was, but I know you want to get traveling as soon as you can.

11.text: Take your time.  Be sure to send money to your family, first and foremost.

next.text: I'll be sure to come say goodbye before I leave.

12.text: You can start thanking me by getting your visa!  I know how much this will mean to you and your family.

13.text: Then, I'll see you soon.  Good luck.

next.text: I had hoped to work abroad in Japan, but our family doesn't have enough money.  It's more costly than traveling to Taiwan.
I had heard some things from our neighbor and from Thanh that made me think Japan would be better.

5.text: And you don't want to go to Taiwan?

next.text: Yes.  I understand if you can't, of course.
No, actually.  I changed my mind.

6.text: Right.  Let me guess--you want me to loan you what you need?

7.text: Sure, no problem.  If you change your mind again, I'll be here.  Good luck deciding where to go.

8.text: I'd be happy to.  You're family, and we've been fortunate with our income the past few years.  How much?

9.text: Alright.  Let me transfer that to you...
